website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas ZX 700, a classic Three Stripes model from the '80s, has returned to make an impression into the sneaker community. The running-inspired model has a mesh-suede upper for breathable comfort, TPU heel counter for additional support, and a full-length rubber outsole for optimum traction. This shoe from the famed ZX series easily suits any outfit with its retro-sporty look and multiple colorways -  be it for casual use or as a street style staple. The ZX 700 effortlessly combines comfort, performance, and style into one recognizable silhouette.
pros: Many purchasers comment that the Adidas ZX 700 is comfortable on foot
Several purchasers love the retro look of this shoe
The traction of the rubber outsole is excellent, some of the purchasers attest
A few reviewers appreciate that it comes with an extra pair of shoelaces in a different color
The ZX 700 is obtainable in a wide variety of colors, which is a plus factor for many purchasers
Many wearers commend this shoe's superb quality and materials
Emphasized by several reviewers is the ample breathability of the mesh material
A small portion of reviewers highlights the added eyelet on the tongue that helps keep it in place
Some reports that it is lightweight
Numerous purchasers applaud the overall support of this shoe
cons: Several purchasers are not impressed with the minimal arch support of this shoe
A few reviewers comment that the sole of this shoe is a bit hard at first, but gets better after the break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Adidas 700,s trainers are the best around
customer_reviews.text: They are the only runners that will fit my feet perfectly as I have a high in step and everr other runners give me problems, Adidas trainers are just so comfortable and easy to wear every day,especially the 700 edition, I also bought the zx750 version and their excellent aswell, 5stars all around
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the size will be perfect. The shoes looks comfortable and nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to my brother,so I will send it to Hungary soon. Hopefully the size will be perfect. The shoes looks comfortable and nice. He loves sports shoes....I have sent it and its arrived.The size is perfext,i was a bit worry.
customer_reviews.author: Ibolya Zadravecz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as stated
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time a nice trainer, would have given five stars but came with a small mark on one of the stripes which would not come off. Could the trainer's be seconds?
customer_reviews.author: Dean Watson

customer_reviews.title: Adidas trainers
customer_reviews.text: Personal preference, but I thought they would be different so, no, not to my liking, nothing wrong with them size perfect, delivery perfect, just the style does not agree with me.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Crazy

customer_reviews.title: The coolest trainers I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected so perfect. After having these trainers for couple of weeks now I think they could possible be the coolest trainers I’ve ever had or seen for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: G4C

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wow I put these on and felt like linford Christie after a 100 meters sprit it was like I could moon walk on my grandmas wig and not do any damage to the fine fake hair a top quality trainer
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shooos
customer_reviews.text: My third pair don't think they are still making them hard to find in my size

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, look good and very comfy. Fit as expected. Fab price, cheaper then anyone else

customer_reviews.title: This sport shoes does not need any recomendation. Ortholite ...
customer_reviews.text: This sport shoes does not need any recomendation. Ortholite says much as well about confort. Some recomendation about cleaning them would have been needed.

customer_reviews.title: happy hubby
customer_reviews.text: Hubby very happy with these, although it did take him about a week to wear them in

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAINERS.
customer_reviews.text: Great well made hard wearing trainers. Fits my feet perfectly and good to walk in. I have always bought Adidas trainers.

customer_reviews.title: ZX700 -(not ZX750's)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe. However I searched for zx750, and the title of these shown as zx750, until I had bought them and it said " thanks for your purchase of zx700 shoes"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these trainer
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainer! I wear them often and they are really comfortable. Walked all over Barcelona in October in them - no sore feet, aches or pains.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my brother. He was delighted with them. Excellent service, fit and value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers. Just as expected from Adidas. Will be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value M look great and a good fit . What a bargain

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small fitting
customer_reviews.text: Normally take size 9 but front section slightly tight. Returned goods and requested a half size up which fitted fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ace !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: This really was a bargain. Good quality and a good fit , delivered quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes

customer_reviews.title: Fab but now £30 cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today absolutely love them, perfect fit, just disappointed that they are now £30 cheaper!!!

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Zx 700 Sneakers
product_meta.description: These sneakers for men offer a fresh style and are easily combined with your outfit. Mesh upper with suede overlays and comfortable textile lining. With synthetic leather on the top and 3-Stripes for the typical adidas look. Rubber outsole and injection moulded eva midsole for lightweight cushioning. Enjoy the comfort and performance of ortholite® sockliner. Tpu heel clip and eyestay ghillie.
